## Carry Recipe
_Simple Hip Carry – Base Size Minus 5 – Traditional Sling Pass_
- Middle marker on shoulder with wrap draped around for a Traditional Sling Pass
- Tie double knot and bring knot to back
- Slide baby into seat
- Pull rails over shoulder to tighten
